short_summary: Repair Wharf 402 at Ganges Outer Harbour, Salt Spring Island, BC
description: Wharf repairs including pile replacement and repairs as well as other timber replacements at Ganges Outer Harbour, Salt Spring Island, BC, in strict accordance with specifications and accompanying drawings and subject to all terms and conditions of the contract. The pre-qualification list will be terminated upon award of contract and no additional contracts will be awarded.
full_summary:
### Wharf 402 Repairs Ganges, Salt Spring Island, BC
#### Solicitation Reference PW-22-01003998
#### Amendment PW-22-01003998-000
------------------------------------------

**Project Description**
The Government of Canada, represented by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is seeking a contractor for the repair of Wharf 402 at Ganges Outer Harbour, Salt Spring Island, British Columbia. The work includes pile replacement and repairs, as well as timber replacements, in accordance with specifications and drawings.

**Solicitation Details**

*   Publication Date: August 11, 2022
*   Closing Date: August 25, 2022 ( expired)
*   Tender Category: Construction Services
*   Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Region of Opportunity: British Columbia
*   Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
*   Contracting Authority: Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Attachments**

The solicitation documents, including addendum 1, are available online through [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). The attachments cannot be viewed directly and need to be downloaded separately to view.

**Contact Information**

*   Name: Kimberly Walker
*   Email: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
*   Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick
*   Telephone: Not available
